main event: A series of UFO sightings were reported in Lake Charles, Louisiana, involving multiple witnesses observing a large, round silver object that hovered low over trees and then shot upward at high speed.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 11 October 1967 and involved multiple witnesses including a Chief Deputy Sheriff,The described object was much larger than an airplane or helicopter and was observed for approximately 10 minutes,The witnesses included Mrs. Gene Hebert and Mr. Roy Morris, Jr. who corroborated each other's accounts,The reports suggest these sightings may need to be investigated further based on the frequency and nature of the observations,The document is part of Project Blue Book, which aimed to investigate unidentified flying objects.
witness description: The witnesses included residents of Lake Charles, such as Mrs. Gene Hebert and Mr. Roy Morris, Jr., who described the object as large and hovering.
